extends CommonEntityController<T>

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public final void bind(CommonEntity<?> entity,
                       boolean handleAttachment)
        Binds this Entity Controller to an Entity. This is called from elsewhere, and should be ignored entirely.
        Parameters:
        entity - to bind with
        handleAttachment - whether to fire CommonEntityController.onAttached()

      • onDie

        public void onDie()
        Called when this Entity dies (could be called more than one time)

                            HumanHand hand)
        Called when the entity is interacted by something
        Parameters:
        interacter - that interacted
        hand - that is used
        Returns:
        True if interaction occurred, False if not

      • onEntityCollision

        public boolean onEntityCollision(org.bukkit.entity.Entity e)
        Handles the collision of this minecart with another Entity
        Parameters:
        e - entity with which is collided
        Returns:
        True if collision is allowed, False if it is ignored

      • onBlockCollision

        public boolean onBlockCollision(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                                org.bukkit.block.BlockFace hitFace)
        Handles the collision of this minecart with a Block
        Parameters:
        block - with which this minecart collided
        hitFace - of the block that the minecart hit
        Returns:
        True if collision is allowed, False if it is ignored

        public void onBurnDamage(double damage)
        Fired when the entity is getting burned by something
        Parameters:
        damage - dealt

      • isPlayerTakable

        public boolean isPlayerTakable()
        Gets whether this Entity Controller allows players to take this Entity with them. With this enabled, players take the vehicle with them. To disable this default behavior, override this method.
        Returns:
        True if players can take the entity with them, False if not

      • getLocalizedName

        public java.lang.String getLocalizedName()
        Gets the localized name of this Entity. Override this method to change the name.
        Returns:
        Localized name

                   double dy,

      • onMove

        public void onMove(MoveType moveType,
                   double dx,
                   double dy,
                   double dz)
        Performs Entity movement logic, to move the Entity and handle collisions
        Parameters:
        moveType - mode of moving
        dx - offset to move
        dy - offset to move
        dz - offset to move

      • onItemSet

        public void onItemSet(int index,
                      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Called when an item in the inventory changes, if the entity has an inventory
        Parameters:
        index - of the item
        item - it was set to

      • setBlockCollisionEnabled

        public void setBlockCollisionEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether block collisions are handled during movement of the entity. Disabling block collisions causes entities to fall through the floor, but may result in a significant boost in performance.
        Parameters:
        enabled -

      • setEntityCollisionEnabled

        public void setEntityCollisionEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether entity collisions are handled during movement of the entity. Disabling entity collisions causes entities to go right through other entities without being affected, and may result in a significant boost in performance.
        Parameters:
        enabled -

      • setBlockCollisionBounds

        public void setBlockCollisionBounds(org.bukkit.util.Vector bounds)
        Sets custom axis-aligned bounding box x/y/z size dimensions when handling block collisions. If using a larger bounding box, changing the block collision bounding box helps fixing significant stress on the server handling a lot more block collision events than usual.
        Parameters:
        bounds - size vector to set to, null for defaults
